title: Mountain cabin
description: Featuring a balcony and pool views, the apartment includes 1 bedroom, a living room, cable flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen.

title: Luxury Condo
description: Located on the beachfront, this property has a restaurant, a bar, a tennis court and free WiFi.

title: Grand Villa 227
description: The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, and 1 bathroom.

title: Mr. Zhoovi
description: Offering a terrace or balcony with views of the city and sea, the units feature air conditioning, a seating area, cable flat-screen TV and kitchenette.
